Pre-Game Insights: The Black Stars left it late to beat Madagascar 1-0 at the Baba Yara Sports stadium on Friday, while Comoros defeated Central African Republic 4-2 in their opening game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The team departed Accra at 1pm and arrived at the Moroni International Airport at 10pm local time (7pm Gh time) via Ethiopia Airlines.
Ghana are third in the Group - level on 3 points with leaders Comoros and second placed Mali.
Others: The game against Comoros is scheduled for the Moroni Stadium on Tuesday, November 21,2023.
The team will hold its first training session on Sunday, November 19,2023 in readiness for the game on Tuesday.
